article_title: 800-Pound Man Kicked Out of Hospital for Ordering Pizza
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

This article was originally posted by cbs12.com:

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

PROVIDENCE, R.I. (WJAR) — A man who weighs nearly 800 pounds has been kicked out of the hospital because he ordered a pizza.

Steven Assanti, 33, said his eating addiction is what led him to the trunk of his father’s SUV.

He has no place to go after getting booted from Rhode Island Hospital.

Read the rest of the article here.
